system
Class Powerup

java.lang.Object
  system.MapObject
      system.NonLivingUnit
          system.Powerup

public class Powerup
extends NonLivingUnit

The class Powerup represents the types of powerups available in the game. It extends the class NonLivingUnit. It contains three methods which sets the location of the powerup and loads its respective image.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Brett Leighton, Leotard Niyonkuru, Marc-Andre Cataford, Mete Kemertas, Martin Zhang

Constructor Detail

Powerup

public Powerup(int x,
               int y)
This method loads the image of the powerup at its location. It takes as input the x and y co-ordinate of the powerup.

Parameters:
x - The x co-ordinate of the powerup.
y - The y co-ordinate of the powerup.
Method Detail

public system.Powerup.PowerupType getType()
This method gets the type of the power up.

Returns:
Returns the type of the power up.

setType

public void setType(system.Powerup.PowerupType type)
This method sets the type of the power up. It takes as input the type of the power up.

Parameters:
type - This takes as input the type of the power up.
